46 typedef signals::signal<bool (),BooleanAndEventCombiner> EventSignalShouldQuit;

48 class AppBasic : public App {
49  public:
50  class Settings : public App::Settings {
51  public:
52  Settings();
53 
54  void setShouldQuit ( bool aShouldQuit = true );
55  bool isFullScreen() { return mDefaultWindowFormat.isFullScreen(); }
56 
58  bool isResizable() const { return mDefaultWindowFormat.isResizable(); }
60  void setResizable( bool resizable = true ) { mDefaultWindowFormat.setResizable( resizable ); }
62  bool isBorderless() const { return mDefaultWindowFormat.isBorderless(); }
64  void setBorderless( bool borderless = true ) { mDefaultWindowFormat.setBorderless( borderless ); }
66  bool isAlwaysOnTop() const { return mDefaultWindowFormat.isAlwaysOnTop(); }
68  void setAlwaysOnTop( bool alwaysOnTop = true ) { mDefaultWindowFormat.setAlwaysOnTop( alwaysOnTop ); }
69 
71  DisplayRef getDisplay() const { return mDefaultWindowFormat.getDisplay(); }
73  void setDisplay( DisplayRef display ) { mDefaultWindowFormat.setDisplay( display ); }
74 
75 #if defined( CINDER_MSW )
76  void enableConsoleWindow( bool enable = true ) { mEnableMswConsole = enable; }
79  bool isConsoleWindowEnabled() const { return mEnableMswConsole; }
80 #endif
81 
83  void enableQuitOnLastWindowClose( bool enable = true ) { mQuitOnLastWindowClose = enable; }
85  bool isQuitOnLastWindowCloseEnabled() const { return mQuitOnLastWindowClose; }
86 
87  private:
88  bool mQuitOnLastWindowClose;
89 #if defined( CINDER_MSW )
90  bool mEnableMswConsole;
91 #endif
92  };

144  // DO NOT CALL - should be private but aren't for esoteric reasons
146  // Internal handlers - these are called into by AppImpl's. If you are calling one of these, you have likely strayed far off the path.
147 #if defined( CINDER_MAC )
148  void privateSetImpl__( AppImplCocoaBasic *aImpl );
149 #endif
150  bool privateShouldQuit();
151 
152 #if defined( CINDER_MSW )
153  virtual bool getsWindowsPaintEvents() { return true; }
154 #endif
155 
158  static AppBasic* get() { return sInstance; }
159 
161  // These are called by application instantation macros and are only used in the launch process
162  static void prepareLaunch() { App::prepareLaunch(); }
163 #if defined( CINDER_MSW )
164  static void executeLaunch( AppBasic *app, RendererRef renderer, const char *title );
165 #elif defined( CINDER_MAC )
166  static void executeLaunch( AppBasic *app, RendererRef renderer, const char *title, int argc, char * const argv[] ) { App::sInstance = sInstance = app; App::executeLaunch( app, renderer, title, argc, argv ); }
167 #endif
168  static void cleanupLaunch() { App::cleanupLaunch(); }
169 
170  virtual void launch( const char *title, int argc, char * const argv[] );
172 
173  protected:
174  static AppBasic* sInstance;
175 
176  EventSignalShouldQuit mSignalShouldQuit;

182  friend class AppImplMswBasic;
183 #endif

192 // App-instantiation macros
193 
194 #if defined( CINDER_MAC )
195  #define CINDER_APP_BASIC( APP, RENDERER ) \
196  int main( int argc, char * const argv[] ) { \
197  cinder::app::AppBasic::prepareLaunch(); \
198  cinder::app::AppBasic *app = new APP; \
199  cinder::app::RendererRef ren( new RENDERER ); \
200  cinder::app::AppBasic::executeLaunch( app, ren, #APP, argc, argv ); \
201  cinder::app::AppBasic::cleanupLaunch(); \
202  return 0; \
203  }
204 #elif defined( CINDER_MSW )
205  #define CINDER_APP_BASIC( APP, RENDERER ) \
206  int WINAPI WinMain(HINSTANCE hInstance,HINSTANCE hPrevInstance,LPSTR lpCmdLine,int nCmdShow) { \
207  cinder::app::AppBasic::prepareLaunch(); \
208  cinder::app::AppBasic *app = new APP; \
209  cinder::app::RendererRef ren( new RENDERER ); \
210  cinder::app::AppBasic::executeLaunch( app, ren, #APP ); \
211  cinder::app::AppBasic::cleanupLaunch(); \
212  return 0; \
213  }
214 #endif
